simplified: 儿不嫌母丑，狗不嫌家贫

pronunciation.pinyin: ér bù xián mǔ chǒu , gǒu bù xián jiā pín
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: er2 bu4 xian2 mu3 chou3 , gou3 bu4 xian2 jia1 pin2

details.simplified: 儿不嫌母丑，狗不嫌家贫
details.traditional: 兒不嫌母醜，狗不嫌家貧

meanings.value: a son won't abandon his mother for being ugly, just as a dog won't abandon its owner for being poor (proverb)
